verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>, <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem<s%>, <S%G2409>priest<s%> of the most <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G5290>returning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2871>slaughter<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3307>gave<s%> a tenth <S%G1181>part<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>; <S%G4412%G99999>first<s%> being by <S%G2059>interpretation<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> after <S%G1899>that<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem<s%>, which <S%G3603>is<s%>, <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%>;

Without <S%G540>father<s%>, without <S%G282>mother<s%>, without <S%G35>descent<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> made <S%G871>like<s%> unto the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G3306>remains<s%> a <S%G2409%G99999>priest<s%> <S%G1336>continually<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2334>consider<s%> how <S%G4080>great<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3739>was<s%>, unto whom <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3966>patriarch<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> the <S%G1181>tenth<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2334>spoils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> they that <S%G2983>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%>, who <S%G2983>receive<s%> the office of the <S%G2405>priesthood<s%>, <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to take tithes <S%G586>of<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G80>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2539>though<s%> they come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3751>body<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> he whose descent <S%G1075>is<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1075>counted<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> received <S%G1183>tithes<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> him that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G485>contradiction<s%> the <S%G1640>lesser<s%> is <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2909>greater<s%>.

<S%G2532%G99999>And<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1181>tithes<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3140>he<s%> receives <S%G3140>them<s%>, of whom it is witnessed <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2198>lives<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> I may so <S%G2031>say<s%>, <S%G3017>Levi<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, who <S%G2983>receives<s%> <S%G1181>tithes<s%>, payed <S%G1183>tithes<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3751>body<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3303%G99999>therefore<s%> <S%G5050>perfection<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3020>Levitical<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%>, <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> received the <S%G3549>law<s%>,) <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2089>further<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> was there <S%G450>that<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> should <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> being <S%G3346>changed<s%>, there is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%> a <S%G3331>change<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3348>he<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> are <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G3348>pertains<s%> <S%G5443>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%>, <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> gave <S%G4337>attendance<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G4271>evident<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G393>sprang<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2448>Judah<s%>; <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> far <S%G4054>more<s%> <S%G2612>evident<s%>: for <S%G1487>that<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3665>likeness<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> there <S%G450>arises<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%>,

<S%G3739>Who<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>a<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2222>an<s%> <S%G179>endless<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.
<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G3754>testifies<s%>, <S%G4771>You<s%> are a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> a putting <S%G115>away<s%> of the <S%G4254>previous<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of its <S%G772>weakness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G512>useleness<s%>. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> the bringing <S%G1898>in<s%> of <S%G1680>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>did<s%>; by <S%G3739>which<s%> we draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an oath he was made <S%G3728>priest<s%>:

<S%G1063%G99999>(For<s%> those <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G1526>were<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> him that <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3660>swore<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3338>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3338>repent<s%>, <S%G4771>You<s%> are a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>:)
<S%G2596>By<s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> the <S%G1450>surety<s%> of <S%G1242>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G1526%G99999>were<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%>, <S%G1223>because<s%> they were not <S%G2967>allowed<s%> to <S%G3887>continue<s%> by reason of <S%G2288>death<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1223>man<s%>, because <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306%G99999>continues<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%>, <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2420>an<s%> <S%G531>unchangeable<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%>.

<S%G3606>Therefore<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3838>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3838>outermost<s%> that <S%G4334>come<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, seeing <S%G2198>he<s%> <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> make <S%G1793>intercession<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an high <S%G749>priest<s%> was <S%G4241>fitting<s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%>; he is <S%G3741>holy<s%>, <S%G172>innocent<s%>, <S%G283>undefiled<s%>, <S%G5563>separate<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5308>higher<s%> than the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>;

<S%G3739%G99999>Who<s%> <S%G318>needs<s%> <S%G3756%G99999>not<s%> <S%G2250>daily<s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> did those high <S%G749>priests<s%>, to offer <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%>, <S%G4386>first<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, and <S%G1899>then<s%> for the <S%G2992>people<s%>'s: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%>, when he offered <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2525>makes<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> high <S%G749>priests<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G769>weaknesses<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G3728>oath<s%>, which <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, appoints the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, who is <S%G5048>consecrated<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>evermore<s%>.
